sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-container>
<b-row cols="12" align-v="center" align-h="center" class="my-row">
  <barbercard  v-for="kappers in list" :key="kappers.kapper.id" :name="kappers.kapper.name" :age="kappers.kapper.age"></barbercard>
</b-row>
  </b-container>
</template>


<script>
// @ is an alias to /src
import axios from 'axios';


import kapperCard from "@/components/kapperCard.vue"
export default {
  components:{
    'barbercard': kapperCard,
  },
  data(){
    return{
      list: []
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    axios
    
      .get('http://localhost:9999/kapper')
      .then(response => {
        this.list = response.data._embedded.kapperResourceList;
            console.log(this.list);
})
      }

  };
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.my-coll{
  border: 3px solid red;
}
.my-row{
  border: 3px solid green;
}
</style>
